feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Build a speech-to-text transcription pipeline to analyze recorded conversations
entry.summary: Build a pipeline to transcribe and analyze audio conversations by using the Azure Cognitive Services Speech and Language APIs.

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Bicep modules design considerations

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Terraform module design considerations
entry.summary: Design considerations for the Azure landing zones Terraform module.

entry.title: Machine learning operations (MLOps) v2
entry.summary: Learn about a single deployable set of repeatable, and maintainable patterns for creating machine learning CI/CD and retraining pipelines.

entry.title: Management and governance architecture design
entry.summary: Get an overview of Azure management and governance technologies, guidance offerings, solution ideas, and reference architectures.

entry.title: Migrate mainframe data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use tcVISION, a mainframe data replication solution, to migrate data to and from multiple Azure Data Platform services.

entry.title: Azure Communication Services architecture design
entry.summary: Learn how to add communications features to your applications by using Azure Communication Services.

entry.title: Technology choices for Azure solutions
entry.summary: View a list of resources that can help you make informed decisions about the technologies you choose for your Azure solutions.

entry.title: Implement an open-source jump server solution on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create a jump server on Azure by using Apache Guacamole, an open-source tool that provides functionality similar to that of Azure Bastion.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Analyze observational patient data by using OHDSI with the OMOP CDM
entry.summary: Deploy and operate a solution that uses OHDSI and the OMAP CDM to analyze observational patient data.

entry.title: Use a fully managed identity service platform
entry.summary: Learn why it's important to use an identity as a service (IDaaS) platform instead of building or running your own.

entry.title: Near real-time lakehouse data processing
entry.summary: Use Azure Event Hubs, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure Data Lake Storage to create an end-to-end, near real-time data lakehouse data processing solution.

entry.title: Run HP-UX workloads in Azure with Stromasys Charon-PAR
entry.summary: Learn how to use a lift-and-shift approach to migrate an HP-UX workload to Azure. The architecture uses Charon-PAR emulator software.

entry.title: Risk prediction models for surgeries
entry.summary: Enable a risk stratification model for surgeries.

entry.title: Azure App Configuration considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Configuration that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Azure Cache for Redis considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Cache for Redis that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Cache for Redis in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Real-time anomaly detection for conveyor belts
entry.summary: View a reference architecture that describes how to enable real-time anomaly detection for conveyor belts.

entry.title: Predict student attrition
entry.summary: Use machine learning and responsible AI to predict student attrition. Understand factors that affect education. Provide unbiased support for student success.

entry.title: Patterns for inter-spoke networking
entry.summary: Learn about options and best practices for spoke-to-spoke communication in Azure Virtual Network designs.

entry.title: Build and deploy custom document processing models on Azure
entry.summary: See Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Esri ArcGIS Platform on Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: View a reference architecture that shows how to deploy ArcGIS Pro in Azure Virtual Desktop to support the hyperscale of Azure.

entry.title: Access an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) API server
entry.summary: Learn various ways to connect to an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster's API server. Possibilities include Azure Bastion, ExpressRoute, and Cloud Shell.

entry.title: Analyze browser information
entry.summary: Build a practical, scalable, and manageable solution to implement an architecture that analyzes browsers for security and accessibility insights.

entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - Networking.

entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - App Platform.

entry.title: Dynamics Business Central as a service on Azure
entry.summary: This example shows how to establish the production environment for Business Central in partner private Azure environment.

entry.title: Governance of Teams guest users
entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Teams and Azure AD entitlement management to collaborate with other organizations, while maintaining control over resource use.

entry.summary: Build an end-to-end Customer 360 solution by using Azure Synapse Analytics and Dynamics 360 Customer Insights.

entry.summary: Learn how to create an Azure CI/CD pipeline to manage your Power Platform application lifecycle.

entry.title: Loan chargeoff prediction with SQL Server
entry.summary: Build and deploy a machine learning model with SQL Server 2016 with R Services to predict whether a bank loan will soon need to be charged off.

entry.title: Integrate data with Logic App and SQL Server
entry.summary: Automate data integration tasks by using Azure Logic Apps. Configure API calls to trigger tasks like storing data in an on-premises SQL Server database.

entry.title: Remote patient monitoring
entry.summary: Provide a high level of preventative medical care with remote patient monitoring from Azure. Analyze large amounts of medical data in a secure environment.

entry.title: Retail assistant with visual capabilities
entry.summary: Use Azure services with a bot assistant to improve interactions with customers and provide suggestions based on visual information.

entry.title: Visual assistant
entry.summary: Visual assistant identifies image content and delivers related information. It can read business cards and barcodes and recognize people, places, and objects.

entry.title: Manage and deploy Kubernetes in Azure Arc
entry.summary: Learn how Azure Arc extends Kubernetes cluster management and configuration across customer data centers, edge locations, and multiple cloud environments.

entry.title: Keyword search and speech-to-text
entry.summary: Identify speech in static video files and manage it as standard content with this speech-to-text solution. Jump to video points that contain specific phrases.

entry.title: Optimize marketing with machine learning
entry.summary: Extract insights from social media for your big data marketing campaigns by using Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure Cognitive Services.

entry.title: Personalized offers
entry.summary: Build intelligent marketing systems that provide customer-tailored content by using machine learning models that analyze data from multiple sources.

entry.summary: Create content-based recommendation systems that use Azure Machine Learning and Databricks to deliver personalized recommendations.

entry.title: Distributed training, deep learning models
entry.summary: Conduct distributed training of deep learning models across clusters of GPU-enabled VMs by using Azure Machine Learning.

entry.title: Image classification with CNNs
entry.summary: Use convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to classify large volumes of images efficiently. Take advantage of CNN layers to identify elements in images.

entry.title: Predict length of stay and patient flow
entry.summary: Predict capacity and patient flow for your hospital or healthcare facility so that you can enhance the quality of care and improve operational efficiency.

entry.title: Serverless apps using Cosmos DB
entry.summary: Use Azure Functions and Azure Cosmos DB to build globally distributed, scalable, serverless applications.

entry.summary: Use knowledge mining technologies such as key phrase extraction and entity recognition to quickly review dense technical material.

entry.summary: Learn how to use knowledge mining in contract management to help your organization scour thousands of pages to create an accurate bid.

entry.summary: Use knowledge mining to help customer support teams quickly find answers to customer questions or assess customer sentiment at scale.

entry.summary: Use digital asset management to mine knowledge and find information. Ingest unstructured and structured data, enrich it with AI, and explore it via search.

entry.summary: Use CluedIn eventual connectivity data integration to blend data from many siloed data sources and prepare it for analytics and business operations.

entry.summary: Learn how Azure Active Directory can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.summary: Use Azure Traffic Manager to automatically add resources to an existing app to accommodate an increase in load.

entry.summary: Learn about scaling up and managing IoT device populations with deployment stamps, and see how to move devices and applications between stamps.

entry.summary: Build a scalable solution for batch scoring an Apache Spark classification model on a schedule using Azure Databricks.

entry.summary: Learn how to architect a solution that processes changes to underlying data within a web view, without the need for a page refresh, by using real-time services.

entry.summary: Learn how DevSecOps helps you incorporate security best practices from the start of software development.

entry.summary: Store and share database query results, session states, static contents, and more, by using a common cache-aside pattern.

entry.summary: Use AKS to easily ingest and process a real-time data stream, with millions of data points collected via sensors.

entry.summary: Predict failures before they happen with real-time assembly line data and Azure Machine Learning and Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Custom business processes
entry.summary: This example demonstrates how you can deploy portals that automate manual or paper-based processes and surface rich user experience.

entry.summary: Use Dynamics 365 Customer Insights to create an enhanced customer dataset and make it available in Azure Data Lake for consumption by Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.summary: Azure Synapse Analytics brings together data integration, enterprise data warehousing, and big data analytics.

entry.summary: Big Data Analytics with Azure Data Explorer demonstrates Azure Data Explorer's abilities to cater to volume, velocity, and variety of data.

entry.summary: Learn about the recommended architecture for deploying an enterprise application using App Services Environment in Azure.

entry.summary: Transform latent information in your image and text data into full text searchable content with Azure Cognitive Search pre-built and custom skills.

entry.summary: Learn how to build high availability of services into your business continuity and disaster recovery strategy.

entry.summary: This example shows how to establish the production environment for Business Central in partner private Azure environment.

entry.summary: Avoid continually creating new instances of an object that is meant to be created once and then shared.
